desc.zh: 镇江城市轨道交通试运营线路图于2025年绘制，此线路图为虚拟线路图，以江苏省镇江市为基础，设计城市轨道交通，共设有轨道交通六条线，分别为1号线（朱方路～江苏大学）、2号线（世业洲～丁卯）、3号线（扬州～句容）、4号线（焦山公园东门～常州奔牛国际机场）、5号（长江生态湿地公园～扬中）、S1号线（宝华山国家森林公园～朱方路），一条城际机场线直达南京禄口国际机场，一条有轨电车，一条城际风景线，连接常州、无锡两地主要景区，一条洲际直达线。
desc.en:
Zhenjiang City Railway Transit Trial Operations System Map was drawn in 2025. This route map is a virtual one, designed based on Zhenjiang City, Jiangsu Province, covering a total of six urban rail transit lines. They are respectively: 
- Line 1 (Zhufang Road ~ Jiangsu University)
- Line 2 (Shiye Island ~ Dingmao)
- Line 3 (Yangzhou ~ Jurong)
- Line 4 (East Gate of Jiaoshan Park ~ Changzhou Benniu International Airport)
- Line 5 (Yangtze River Ecological Wetland Park ~ Yangzhong)
- Line S1 (Baohua Mountain National Forest Park ~ Zhufang Road)
In addition, there is one intercity airport line directly leading to Nanjing Lukou International Airport, one tram line, one intercity scenic line connecting major scenic spots in Changzhou and Wuxi, and one intercontinental direct line.

reference: 爱发电,Sun Aug 24 2025 08:00:00 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
